content.label: I absolutely cannot stop playing owari to hajimari no oto cause jeez Louise that song is so happy!! In addition to all the many other cool songs I really like the color scheme and the way this game greets you witje an adorable opening, hardly anyone goes to those I think? But the setting’s menu song is soooo peaceful as well!! To all my filmmaking weebs in here, if you ever wanted to grab friends and make an anime opening but don’t quite know what song to pick, there’s a whole bunch here!! Anyways, this game is awesome and haven’t stop playing it for three years now!!

title.label: You won’t regret downloading this game lol

content.label:
This game is flip flopping amazing bros, you should definitely download it. I love the music and how it’s super easy to get keys if you try hard enough. This game is very cash money, 10/10 would recommend.

-The Ultimate Fangirl
(AKA Newt in the game.)
(Newt is from The Maze Runner btw. Y’all should read it. Newt is the best.)
Since this game has their own sign-in system you can play the songs purchased on google play. I was brain blasted when the thought came up. Love ya Rayark.
Good app
I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling and I have also tried restarting my phone multiple times but I just get stuck on he loading screen at 247/247 the game is broken
Lately, there has been a bug that causes the game to freeze when I try to select a song. I have to restart the app after each song because it keeps on freezing.

So I’ve been playing this game since it came out🥰 it’s grown with me and so have I. I really love the graphics and the music, this whole game just gives me sunny day sparkle type feelings, and it’s funny how the game keeps coming to me with age because I’m getting up there. But all the songs are just perfect, any kids you have there’s a song. The little moments make me happy too, whenever I mess up I just replay and start over, or try it on hard mode😈. This game is just great and that’s it really, I just wish more people knew about it❤️

title.label: Please, I love this game so much.

content.label: You know what you should do? Have this be turned into an anime. The plot is amazing, and the characters are beautiful!

title.label: It’s good but there is one issue.

content.label: I think this game is pretty good but the only issue with it that makes me not want to play it is that it’s very slow and says that I have no Wi-Fi connection which I do my WiFi is perfectly fine I have uninstalled and reinstalled but it still doesn’t seem to fix the issue I hope you guys can fix it so it’s a more enjoyable game and I can play it more.
Every time I try to play this game I’m stuck in an infinite waiting loop for every song. I’ve reinstalled the game multiple times and the problem persists.

I’ve played the game since 2018 I believe—(Can’t really remember) but the game is still amazing to this day. I’m so addicted to it, and all the songs are so catchy. The one thing I kind of wish was in the game, was getting to go against other players or something like that. I’d also like it even more if it were easier to fulfill the quests.
i enjoy this game and it’s very fun, but months ago i paid for keys (the limited sale for 10 keys for $4.99) and the transaction went through and took my money but i never got the keys.

title.label: It’s great but what about masquerade?!?!

content.label: I love the music and everything but for some reason I CANNOT FIND MASQUERADE IN VOEZ ANYMORE and I truly love that song tbh is ther anyway that y’all can put it back on voez if y’all took it out. PLEASE!!!!!
It is a great game. The only thing is, there is a glitch on mine! It says “incorrect password or acc. name,”  then I click ok, then it says, “ can not log in to acc.”

Honestly I hadn’t been a huge fan of any rhythm related games before I played this one, but this one is just too good. I feel there is something very appealing about the huge variety of songs available and the UI is also very appealing and user friendly somehow, so despite not having much experience with music games I found myself quickly getting used to it.

The recent 1.1.5 update made the game unplayable on iPad Pro (7th gen) when logging in by Facebook. It will load 248/248 and then it will say network error. 
Please fix this Rayark!

Update: I was able to reinstall the app and sign in as a guest.
I logged in with Facebook in the game settings. When relaunching the app, I was logged in without any errors.

I love this game, it’s fun and filled with great songs.  When I first played I was already in love with the game.  A few days ago, the game stopped working and told me I wasn’t connected to WiFi, so I deleted the app and reinstalled hoping it was just a glitch or something.  I even tried switching my connection and it still didn’t let me get through the loading screen.  I don’t know what’s wrong but please try to fix this, thanks!

In my opinion, the game is great. It’s a little addicting and has good songs. What I really like is that when you hit the series of the falling notes, the background becomes alive and are colorful. Every time you hit a note or on a different mode you would have possibly hit a note there is a blast of color somewhere on the screen. I love this game and if you love music then I suggest you get it.
Would have given five stars but the game doesn’t support iPhone X and the aspect ratio is off because of that

This game is amazing on my IPhone XSMAX. 

But it will not load on my IPad Pro. Please fix when enable. Thank you for your hard work.ありがとうございます

My mom deleted this game because it had an inappropriate song on there and that make me sad so make the songs kids-proof. So,anyway,I want more free songs. There are a lot of locked up songs that I really want, and I have to pay keys and money for, so this would make a huge improvement because I am am trying to save money right now so please make more free songs for the people who don’t have that kind of money.
Usually I would play OSU! On pc but I needed a mobile alternative and I found this it’s perfect way better than the mobile version of OSU!

I have been playing VOEZ for a very long time since launch. And I’ve recently upgraded to an iPhoneX and was wondering if you guys will ever consider supporting iPhoneX and 11. I would love to hear back about this. Thank you.
I love 💕 This game it’s so relaxing and addictive I just love it
It’s a Rayark rhythm game, of course it’s good.

title.label: It’s been years since this came out but I’ve played it enough for a review

content.label: I remember spending HOURS and it’s so fun the song are really good (tragically not all are in Apple Music) but really fun game only problem is that on my iPhone X it’s cropped very badly so I would like for an update to fix this
I downloaded this assuming it would have the resolution to fit iPhone X+... could you add the feature please?

VOEZ by far is one of best games I have played in my life, if not the best rhythm game.
The gameplay and style is gorgeous, beautiful, amazing and enjoyable.
There is just some minor issues with the devices compatibility, it doesn’t fit my screen and the home button is visible and accessible during the game, which is preventing me from playing the game. 
I hope that you could give it some love, it’s nice that Rayark is developing other games and other people may seem to like them more than Voez, but this game deserves to be recognized and fixed.

Sincerely Rayark Lovere

title.label: I love it, but there are too many bugs

content.label: I absolutely love this game, even since I first played it in 2018. However, I am now playing on a 5SE and while I'm on my journey to complete a special difficulty level, it is nearly impossible to do that because when I tap a note that should give me max perfect or normal perfect, I INSTEAD MAY GET A OK OR A MISS FOR NO FREAKING REASON, AND IT'S WHY I HAVE BEEN RAGING! You still have a lot of bug fixing to do, and I will at least be happy once you fix the game.

title.label: Full screen on newer iPhone pls

content.label: I love your games so much and I played from my iphone 5 to iPhone 11. Though I notice that you guys don’t make it full screen for the newer iPhone and it’s kinda bugs me out when there is a space at each of the side of the iPhone, left out and not used. Could you make it full screen for the new iPhone pls??

I am into rhythm games right now, this one is amazing!
I saw it on youtube and decided to give it a try.

This game has guided me through some awful, awful times. The music and varying difficulty is so nice, and the simplicity of this game is exactly what I wanted when I got the app. Thank you for making something that’s helped me so much.

title.label: 756 songs, but I only get a tiny fraction to play for free.

content.label: This game is great. But the monetization practices are just as bad as Cytus 2’s. Just get the Switch version. I know I will when I finally get a Switch.

title.label: Not updated to fit new iPhone screens!

content.label: First of all, I really like this game. I used to play it on my iPhone 5S before updating to an iPhone 11, but when I launched the game I was surprised to find that the game wasn’t updated to support my phone size. I would love to play this game on my new phone, please update it!

It won’t fit my screen. I open up the game and the play area is noticeably smaller them my screen size which feels very unnatural, and with it being a game full of precision it gets in the way having my hands coloring a majority of the screen. I’m on iPhone 11.
How do you change sound settings? I have no music. How does one play a music rhythm game with no music. Why is there no music. Really.

title.label: Love the App! Just one thing

content.label: I love the game and its music. However, it gets a little annoying whenever I make a sliding feature on the iPhone X/11 and the phone can’t help but switch apps. If there is a way to make it so the phone doesn’t switch apps until two swipes like some other games to help prevent this, I’d change to a five star.
It’s really beautiful and cool game

This game is super addictive and it’s my favorite game to play ever. The songs are catchy and the levels are challenging. It’s super satisfying when you get a full combo or even beat your high score. 

MAJOR CON 
The app is super glitchy. I’m unable
To make an account and I have several keys that I have purchased and never received about 24 keys. Roughly $20 worth. I can’t uninstall it because the app won’t let my register and I have unlock a lot of song I refuse to lose.
please make a ios update for ios 12 so it can fill screen so i can make it 5 star!!! 0w0
Love the game, but is not optimized for iPhone 11 pro max. I don’t know if it is for the other larger iPhones but that’s the only issue

I had this game a few years back and decided to retry it but almost all of the songs that were free to play are now locked and require payment...I have only 2 unlocked songs which is no fun. Wish there was an option to get keys for higher scores instead of having to pay almost 3$ per song.
The game is a great music game, but older devices can't keep up anymore, apparently.

This app is amazing. I love the selection of music, the storyline, the game’s mechanics, and everything else. BUT! You should focus on buying the console version. It costs money (20 USD) but you don’t have to buy keys in order to play any songs. Instead, keys are given through completing missions that unlock the story, and they give avatars instead of songs. The app is amazing, but it’s better to get it on the Nintendo Switch for an easier play experience.

I love this game and I love the music. In my opinion it would be 5 stars but I paired for a key in the store and never wound up getting the key. The purchase was on my cards history and everything. I went to look for a support email in the game settings where it should be and couldn’t find one. Otherwise great game.

terrible game. every time i try to hold down my fingers to do the white sliding noes, it opens up the menu and messes with my progress. not optimized for the iPad. Absolute garbage, would not recommend to anyone not playing on iPhone.

I really love this game and all other rhythm games by Rayark. But I can’t give VOEZ 5 stars. The iPad Pro 2018 has come out for over a year now, and VOEZ hasn’t added support for the new resolutions. People play on iPads because they have bigger screens. Having black bars on the sides really takes away the aesthetic graphics of VOEZ. There are definitely a lot of people also requiring this support. It shouldn’t be that hard to support a new resolution. Even the first Cytus received an update after a year for the resolution support. Hope you can fix it soon!

title.label: Do Not get this app. Get the game on the switch!

content.label:
This is an AMAZING, addicting game. I’ve been playing for a year and I’ve been so satisfied. They made an amazing game! 

The songs: 
The songs are so catchy and you can listen over and over and never get sick of it! 

The graphics:
This game has such amazing scenery, and fits the music so well!

The story: 
the story is amazing, but it is slightly difficult to get to. The game makes it so you have to practice til you can make it.

To new players: 
Don’t make the mistake I did, you can’t restart a level until you get it perfect. If you have a good score, keep moving! You can always go back!

How to purchase:
My only complaint is that in the app, you have to buy the songs one by one. If you have a nintendo switch, I recommend getting it on there. It’s a one time purchase and is a better deal than buying each song individually for a higher price. The switch version is only about $20.00 (I think, it might be about $30.00)

Conclusion:
This game is amazing, I love it and can’t stop playing! This is a must get!!! Thanks for taking your time to read this.

title.label: Rayark’s Least Cared for Rhythm Game and it Shows

content.label:
VOEZ is beautiful. It’s a stunning game, with calming artwork and an overall great vibe! It also has some of the most phenomenal map design I’ve seen. Visually, this game is amazing and a treat to the eyes, so much so, that I keep coming back to it as some sort of guilty pleasure. 

Positives out of the way, here are the negatives.

VOEZ is free. VOEZ also has hundreds of songs. And by that I mean a whopping 726. Seriously, a big selection like this is amazing! There’s definitely a likely chance there’s a song you like. Back to the free part— VOEZ is not free. VOEZ has 726 songs, and only 12 of which you can obtain freely to keep. They have a rotating selection though! But it rotates like once every few months. Yeah Rayark is pretty neglecting of this game. Each song is 1$ going by Rayark prices, so if you really like the game, have fun spending upwards to hundreds for only a seventh of the song selection. You get lucky if you get a deal like 5$ for 10 keys (currency to buy songs). My tip? Just buy the switch version if you have a switch because every song is unlocked. If you don’t? What a shame, guess you gotta save those keys for those songs you REALLY like. Or shell out that cash dollar chaching—!

There’s also the fact that if you have an iPhone 10 and up (with the large screens), you’re going to have ugly black bars on this otherwise beautiful game. Another technical gripe I have is that every time I start a song, it flips the game? So I have to flip my phone upside down and once the song finishes I flip it again. Annoying.

Fun game, rigged from the start with awful freenium.
This game has very good graphics and the songs are really fun to play!
